page.title: 04ECONOMICS - GLOUCESTER 1985
page.content: BANKS: 13 BANKS EXIST IN CITY CENTRE OR NEAR DOCKS AND INDUSTRIAL SITES. MAIN BANKS ARE BARCLAYS,MIDLAND,LLOYDS AND NAT.WEST. SOME HAVE 24 HOUR SERVICE BY EXTERNAL CASH DISPENSING MACHINES AND NIGHT DEPOSIT SAFES. FINANCE COMPANIES: 3 COMPANIES, THE WESTERN TRUST, MERCANTILE CREDIT AND SCOTTISH FINANCE ARE IN THE CITY. BUILDING SOCIETIES: 18 OFFICES IN CENTRAL AREA MAIN ONES ARE HALIFAX, ANGLIA, ABBEY NATIONAL, LEEDS AND WOOLWICH. INSURANCE: 28 OFFICES IN CITY CENTRE OFFER FIRE,LEGAL,MORTGAGE AND GENERAL COVER. MAIN ONES ARE PEARL,PRUDENTIAL, NORWICH, EAGLE STAR AND TRIDENT.
